{Xiane}

    Xiane carried Spears through the hatch watching as another 'Ma=
ximal' chased a pair of bots into another room, the sound of explosions and=
 damaged metal rung through the ship, laser fire echoed hollowly through th=
e Ark and from outside as the battle raged.

    He had little trouble find=
ing the chambers, his memory circuits told him that the ancient battle scen=
e was through the far door but as he opened it he knew something was wrong,=
 no autobots nor decpticons were frozen in combat here, and the CR chambers=
 looked as if they had seen better days, a great rupture in the middle of t=
he room smoked and sparked. It seems an explosion had hit the center of the=
 room.

    Xiane scanned the chambers one was already in use but was worki=
ng at half power, two were offline, a fourth still seemed operational and i=
n this he placed the damaged Spears, slowly closing the hatch, it was then =
the larger explosion could be heard, coming from the front of the ship.
Mak=
ing sure Spears was secure in the chamber, Xiane turned back to the main co=
rridor and looked left and right.

    To aid in the trouble of the engine =
room, or to investigate the bridge explosion. Detaching his sheild from his=
 back, readying it on his arm and drawing his sword he turned and ran for t=
he area that housed the engines hoping he chose right...
